005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaData;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.JsonGroupAsBehavior;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundAssembly;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundChoiceGroup;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundGroupedAssembly;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.GroupAs;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaAssembly;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.IModelConstraintsBase;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.ITargetedConstraintBase;
018
019import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
020import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
021
022import java.util.LinkedList;
023import java.util.List;
024
025@SuppressWarnings({
026    "PMD.DataClass",
027    "PMD.ExcessivePublicCount",
028    "PMD.FieldNamingConventions"
029})
030@MetaschemaAssembly(
031    name = "assembly-constraints",
032    moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
033public class AssemblyConstraints implements IModelConstraintsBase {
034  private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
035
036  @BoundAssembly(
037      formalName = "Constraint Let Expression",
038      useName = "let",
039      maxOccurs = -1,
040      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "lets", inJson = JsonGroupAsBehavior.LIST))
041  private List<ConstraintLetExpression> _lets;
042
043  @BoundChoiceGroup(
044      minOccurs = 1,
045      maxOccurs = -1,
046      assemblies = {
047          @BoundGroupedAssembly(formalName = "Allowed Values Constraint", useName = "allowed-values",
048              binding = TargetedAllowedValuesConstraint.class),
049          @BoundGroupedAssembly(formalName = "Expect Condition Constraint", useName = "expect",
050              binding = TargetedExpectConstraint.class),
051          @BoundGroupedAssembly(formalName = "Targeted Index Has Key Constraint", useName = "index-has-key",
052              binding = TargetedIndexHasKeyConstraint.class),
053          @BoundGroupedAssembly(formalName = "Value Matches Constraint", useName = "matches",
054              binding = TargetedMatchesConstraint.class),
055          @BoundGroupedAssembly(formalName = "Targeted Unique Constraint", useName = "is-unique",
056              binding = TargetedIsUniqueConstraint.class),
057          @BoundGroupedAssembly(formalName = "Targeted Index Constraint", useName = "index",
058              binding = TargetedIndexConstraint.class),
059          @BoundGroupedAssembly(formalName = "Targeted Cardinality Constraint", useName = "has-cardinality",
060              binding = TargetedHasCardinalityConstraint.class)
061      },
062      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "rules", inJson = JsonGroupAsBehavior.LIST))
063  private List<? extends ITargetedConstraintBase> _rules;
064
065  public AssemblyConstraints() {
066    this(null);
067  }
068
069  public AssemblyConstraints(IMetaschemaData data) {
070    this.__metaschemaData = data;
071  }
072
073  @Override
074  public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
075    return __metaschemaData;
076  }
077
078  @Override
079  public List<ConstraintLetExpression> getLets() {
080    return _lets;
081  }
082
083  public void setLets(List<ConstraintLetExpression> value) {
084    _lets = value;
085  }
086
087  /**
088   * Add a new {@link ConstraintLetExpression} item to the underlying collection.
089   *
090   * @param item
091   *          the item to add
092   * @return {@code true}
093   */
094  public boolean addLet(ConstraintLetExpression item) {
095    ConstraintLetExpression value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
096    if (_lets == null) {
097      _lets = new LinkedList<>();
098    }
099    return _lets.add(value);
100  }
101
102  /**
103   * Remove the first matching {@link ConstraintLetExpression} item from the
104   * underlying collection.
105   *
106   * @param item
107   *          the item to remove
108   * @return {@code true} if the item was removed or {@code false} otherwise
109   */
110  public boolean removeLet(ConstraintLetExpression item) {
111    ConstraintLetExpression value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
112    return _lets != null && _lets.remove(value);
113  }
114
115  @Override
116  public List<? extends ITargetedConstraintBase> getRules() {
117    return _rules;
118  }
119
120  public void setRules(List<? extends ITargetedConstraintBase> value) {
121    _rules = value;
122  }
123
124  @Override
125  public String toString() {
126    return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
127  }
128}
